---

## Example Sections

Below are example sections you can use or modify for your sprint:

### UI/UX Improvements

- [ ] Component/feature enhancement
- [ ] User flow optimization
- [ ] Design consistency updates
- [ ] Accessibility improvements

### Admin Dashboard

- [ ] New feature implementation
- [ ] Metrics and analytics
- [ ] User management
- [ ] Configuration updates

### Code Quality & Testing

- [ ] Refactoring tasks
- [ ] Test coverage improvements
- [ ] Performance optimizations
- [ ] Documentation updates

### Bug Fixes & Maintenance

- [ ] Critical bug fixes
- [ ] Technical debt reduction
- [ ] Dependency updates
- [ ] Security patches

---

## Notes

- Update the sprint number in the title
- Replace example sections with your actual sprint goals
- Use nested checkboxes for subtasks
- Add additional sections as needed for your sprint scope
